name: Feltari
description:
Feltari is a 2D action RPG game where you have to find ways to go to the next rooms by using fairies with different colors. Each fairy has a color matching things to progress through the world.  A Tutorial is provided, go ahead and download the game!

Content suited to any age.

Controls:

Pause Menu
InteractAttack Melee
Move

Supported Languages:

Credits:

Game on!
